start.state: Hi, I'm Lyndis. You can call me Lyn.
I am Lyn, of the Lorca tribe. Nice to meet you.
You think you can defeat me? I dislike seeing someone facing such overwhelming odds, but you are welcome to try.
I am from the noble house of Caelin, yet I truly belong to the open plains. Just call me Lyn, all right?
